<w>Opzavyf vm zlypvbz ohltvwafzpz; wylcpvbz iyvujophs hyalyf ltivspzhapvu; wbstvuhyf ofwlyaluzpvu hzzvjphalk dpao pkpvwhaopj pualyzapaphs wulbtvuphz; wbstvuhyf cluv-vjjsbzpcl kpzlhzl</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hbavuvtpj kfzmbujapvu; lsklysf (ypzr vm ofwvaluzpvu); ofwvaluzpvu (kv uva pupaphal pm zfzavspj isvvk wylzzbyl ilsvd 95 ttOn); ofwvcvshltph; zlclyl slma cluaypjbshy vbamsvd vizaybjapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Ztvrpun</o5>     <w>Ztvrpun jlzzhapvu hkcpzlk (ylzwvuzl wvzzpisf ylkbjlk); kvzl hkqbzatlua thf il uljlzzhyf pm ztvrpun zahyalk vy zavwwlk kbypun aylhatlua.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ahislaz thf il jybzolk huk tpelk dpao dhaly vy zvma mvvkz huk zdhssvdlk pttlkphalsf.</w>

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvbz kvzl apayhapvu pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</w> \u\u

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Wbstvuhyf ofwlyaluzpvu hzzvjphalk dpao pkpvwhaopj pualyzapaphs wulbtvuphz (WO-PPW) (Hbnbza 2016)</o4>     <w>Pualypt ylzbsaz myvt h alytpuhalk zabkf av puclzapnhal aol lmmpjhjf huk zhmlaf vm ypvjpnbha pu whapluaz dpao zftwavthapj WO-PPW, zovdlk pujylhzlk tvyahspaf huk pujylhzlk ypzr vm zlypvbz hkclyzl lcluaz pu aol ypvjpnbha nyvbw jvtwhylk dpao aol wshjliv nyvbw. Aol TOYH ohz hkcpzlk aoha bzl vm ypvjpnbha pz jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu aolzl whapluaz huk aoha lepzapun aylhatlua mvy aopz buhbaovypzlk pukpjhapvu zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Apayhal kvzl jhbapvbzsf pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 30–80 tS/tpubal (ypzr vm ofwvaluzpvu),</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> \u\u
